Text: Been very anxiously awaiting this title - gotta say im disappointed. The art is sub-par, there is no real story, what was it 5 pages long... look your favorites are here and they (kinda) look like the tv show actors and... the end.

@MrDowntown I think its really going to be meant to read monthly. 

On another note PLEASE buy it if you like it, its only $.99 and we need to show support!

hey i know this can be said about all torrents, but movies and tv shows etc are alot safer from cancellation due to downloads than comic books are, and if everyone downloads this comic for free and they dont sale enough then they will discontinue it in a snap, so come on people if you just gotta download it at least pay the .99 cents to buy it on its real site to show support and help make sure we get a season 12 in the future :) true smallville fans wouldnt wanna kill the only chance we got to see where the story goes and if LEX ever starts getting some of his memory back cuz come on allt he stuff he forgot about his dead brother and his dad and stuff is what made him LEX wasn't it?
